page.title: 20RECREATION _ Games
page.content: At the bottom of our school field we have a climbing frame which we climb on in fine weather.Our field is sloping so it is not very good for foot ball and sports day.Netball is played on the tarmac which is also used for play times in the winter. We sometimes play catch and the boys play football and cricket.We have a craze on Queeny at the moment. A row of children pretend to have the ball behind them but one person is actually holding it.The person stand- ing out in front has to guess who's got the ball when they say, "Queeny,Queeny who's got the ball?" We play lots of ball games.Hopscotch is played with a ball or stone and marbles and conkers are popular in season.The girls like to play French skipping with elastic.
